greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f. satisfies: A(x) = 1/(1 - x) * Product_{k>0} A(x^(2*k)) / Product_{k>1} A(x^(2*k-1)).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: b[n_] := If[n == 1, 1, Product[{p, e} = pe; If[2 == p, e--, If[e > 1, p = 0, p = -1]]; p^e, {pe, FactorInteger[n]}]];
etr[p_] := Module[{b}, b[n_] := b[n] = If[n == 0, 1, Sum[Sum[d*p[d], {d, Divisors[j]}]*b[n - j], {j, 1, n}]/n]; b];
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Nov 05 2018
